title: Integrated Informatics Competency Development Program for Clinical and Translational Science

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Mathematics-based clinical research competency enhancement program for in-service professionals, integrating core competencies in library science, biomedical informatics, and academic communication

learning_goals: Learners can establish strategies for utilizing specialized databases to search clinical research data.
Learners can develop data analysis plans during research design using biomedical informatics tools.
Learners can systematically document research findings according to academic publication ethics standards.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
